column5: When we can't agree with people, bomb them all.
Apperently eh?  Unreal

Half the people that comment about gun violence being a major issue now wanna go bomb another country!  Also, im only commenting this once. So the thread dont get derailed(inbox me your complaints or tinfoil hat comments?)  But imagine if Syrians were ARMED to fight for their country???  Hmmmmm...

You may agree on stripping terrorist and pot seed sellers of their citizenship and forcing your opinion of what women should wear but what do you want to pay for it. The minister of women's wear has spent  $250K so far to stop .0002.9% (2)of immigrants from covering their face at citizenship ceremonies while  who knows how many  beards the minister of men's wear has allowed to slip through. The terrorist and whatever other criminals in jail will have all the time in the world to to go to court so that could cost a couple hundred grand each. And to deport someone the other country will have to agree to take our terrorist, think that's going to happen?  And they ask where is JT going to find the $  If the minister of want's to look at naked women he can go to the strip club like everybody else, it's cheaper for the rest of us.

The RedStar  actually has it reversed and forecasting a majourity,, probably just a ploy to motivate the " anybody but Harper brigade".  http://www.thestar.com/news/federal-election/2015/09/24/conservatives-swing-into-lead-close-in-on-majority-government-new-poll-suggests.html

You guys realize these polls are skewed to the leanings of the poling company.  None of them are accurate and a true representation of the vote.  They are to easy to manipulate .  Threehundredeight has the Cons advancing in the polls also.  I'll believe it on election night and not before.  The polls are just designed to make supporters feel good, and to try an manipulate the undecided to back a winner.  Don't be taken in.
The consequences of a Trudeau or Mulcair government are truly frightening for Canada! I will leave it at that.......
Can you imagine what would happen to the country if either one teamed up with WYNNE  I thought Wynne was Justin's puppetmaster.

Dr, David Suzuki (PHD in Zoology) in my humble opinion is nothing more than a talking head. His outlandish claims such as in 2013 when interviewed in Australian television was that Harper was building prisons to house environmental activists has resulted in his banishment from his own foundation. He brings up many things we do that harms the environment and gives little or no solutions. I attended an Iron and Steel conference at Mac where he chastised us for destroying the environment in the pursuit of capital gains. When it was pointed out to him the steel industry in countries like China, Russia and India have zero environmental appliances in place he sounded like the polished politico he is and gave a confusing retort that would make the best politician proud.  I don't really care what he has to say, it's mostly Bull from a talking head. Justin may be a twerp but I know Suzuki is a con artist.
Lol  Nah we cant have guns(cause people with guns are crazy)  Now lets just bomb everyone, thats cool  SMH I didn't even want to touch that one... lol
